short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tiện ích mở rộng tự động điền câu trả lời trên trang Edunext Premium Auto thông qua AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Develop an automation tool for Edunext with the following features:

Auto-fill Comments:
The tool will automatically add comments to assignments or discussions based on predefined criteria, saving time for administrators or instructors.

Auto-grading:
The tool will automatically evaluate assignments or discussion contributions from students based on pre-configured assessment standards, ensuring quick and accurate grading.

Comment Responses:
The tool will automatically reply to comments from students or participants, providing feedback or answering questions promptly and accurately.

All these features are integrated to optimize the teaching and learning process, save time, and enhance efficiency.
